1492920.name: *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP MLG EXPANSION (POG CHAMP)
1492920.description:
Get into the world of bhop, with brand new spicy memes, with the brand new DLC Pack! Including brand new textures and skins for the first 6 base game levels! Enjoy a brand new knife, block textures, and sound effects!

New Textures!
We have a bunch of pog faces and stuff
Looks nice

The Sky is a bit, you know, different.

The memes are EXTREMELY up-to-date. dont even @ me on this point. Incredible quality
I hope you have fun playing this.
